description:
This is a program launcher that allows you to take advantage of the entire screen area. Covers the shortcomings of the start menu that cannot display many items at once.

## Requirements

- Windows 10 or later
- .NET 6 (or later) Desktop Runtime

## Package installation information

- The package will be installed under the folder specified by the environment variable `ChocolateyToolsLocation`.

## Runtime installation

### Case 1

Install with the `.NET Desktop Runtime` runtime installer.

https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/6.0

**Recommended**
https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/8.0

### Case 2

Install the chocolatey package `Microsoft .NET Desktop Runtime 6.x.x` or `Microsoft .NET Desktop Runtime 8.x.x`.
summary: This is a program launcher that allows you to take advantage of the entire screen area.
